subject: Awards, Decorations and Honors
Boxing
lead_paragraph: Manny Pacquiao accepted his third Fighter of the Year award, and his trainer, Freddie Roach, was honored for the fourth time by the Boxing Writers Association of America.
snippet: Manny Pacquiao accepted his third Fighter of the Year award, and his trainer, Freddie Roach, was honored for the fourth time by the Boxing Writers Association of America.
